methods.name: public void testFocus_noService() throws Throwable
methods.comment: * This is the baseline test for focusing the 2 views when autofill is disabled.

methods.name: public void testFocus_serviceDoesNotAutofill() throws Throwable
methods.comment:
* This time the service is called, but it returns a {@code null} response so the UI behaves
     * as if autofill was disabled.

methods.name: public void testFocus_autofillBothFields() throws Throwable
methods.comment: * Now the service returns autofill data, for both username and password.

methods.name: public void testFocus_autofillUsernameOnly() throws Throwable
methods.comment: * Now the service returns autofill data, but just for username.

methods.name: public void testChange_noService() throws Throwable
methods.comment: * This is the baseline test for changing the 2 views when autofill is disabled.

methods.name: public void testChange_serviceDoesNotAutofill() throws Throwable
methods.comment:
* This time the service is called, but it returns a {@code null} response so the UI behaves
     * as if autofill was disabled.

methods.name: public void testChange_autofillBothFields() throws Throwable
methods.comment: * Now the service returns autofill data, for both username and password.

methods.name: public void testChange_autofillUsernameOnly() throws Throwable
methods.comment: * Now the service returns autofill data, but just for username.

methods.name: private void changeTest(boolean waitForService) throws Throwable

methodNames: private void changeTest(boolean waitForService) throws Throwable
